akas: Ku Ye Bu Liu Lei (original title)
akas from release info: Ku Ye Bu Liu Lei (original title)
imdb.plot outline: Young girl Mei Yuan becomes pregnant. Her family considers her pregnancy a shame and cut her loose. At the same time, her irresponsible boyfriend disappears. Cornered as Mei Yuan is, she has to drop out of school and comes to a coastal city in attempt to reconnect with her boyfriend. In this new city, hopeless Mei Yuan falls into a lake in Jiangpin Park; fortunately, a young man rescues Mei Yuan, then leaves without saying a word. The young man who saves Mei Yuan is Tan Xiaoliang, a recently released convict. The reason why Tan Xiaoliang gets in prison is that Li Chunyang, his former boss, promises him an apartment if Tan could be the scapegoat of him. However, only when he gets out of prison, Tan Xiaoliang finds that Li Chunyang does not keep his promise. Tan Xiaoliang goes to Li Chunyang's place, but is driven out by Li's bodyguards. Tan swears that he will make Li Chunyang pay for what he did. Jing, a cleaner of Jiangbin Park, takes in pregnant Mei Yuan. In 21 Mansion, the most glamorous building in the city, a touching story of Mei Yuan unfolds.
